__how_to_use: Copy this file to mix-generation-switch.json in the project root.
Mode options: reuse_existing | force_regenerate_all | force_regenerate_script | force_regenerate_audio.
reuse_existing: keep any existing script/audio and only generate missing pieces.
force_regenerate_all: regenerate both script and audio for every stop/persona.
force_regenerate_script: regenerate scripts only; audio can still be reused if present.
force_regenerate_audio: regenerate audio only; scripts can still be reused if present.
replay_audio lets you force a specific URL per stop_id and persona.
If you want a different file name/path, set MIX_GENERATION_SWITCH_FILE in env.
